body: I think this was missed earlier, but `infos` has to be passed by reference to actually flag errors in `_gesv_helper_cpu`. This is not part of the PR, but I thought I should let you know.
body_html: I think this was missed earlier, but infos has to be passed by reference to actually flag errors in _gesv_helper_cpu. This is not part of the PR, but I thought I should let you know.
